original_text: So the king did not listen to the people, for it was a turn of affairs brought about by God that the Lord might fulfill his word, which he spoke by Ahijah the Shilonite to Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
korean_text: 왕이 이같이 백성의 말을 듣지 아니하였으니 이 일은 하나님께로 말미암아 난 것이라 여호와께서 전에 실로 사람 아히야로 하여금 느밧의 아들 여로보암에게 이르신 말씀을 응하게 하심이더라

sentences.original_text: So the king did not listen to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왕은 백성들의 말을 듣지 않았다

sentences.original_text: for it was a turn of affairs
that the Lord might fulfill his word
which he spoke by Ahijah the Shilonite
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 실로 사람 아히야를 통해 말씀하신

sentences.original_text: to Jeroboam the son of Nebat
